channel.title: ~Free Forum
channel.description:
Dear Members, Have You got Your own private server? Have a massive community and cant get out the rules to every single player on the server? Then your problem can now be solved!
I'll tell you what i can do; I'll set up a forum for You. Not the "SMFFORFREE, IPBFREE, Invision" But actually a short domain for your members to remember and register. Does this cost me cash? Nope, its absolutely free. Is there a catch? Just a small one (I put my website www.definateleet.net) at the bottom of your website.
The price's ~ SMF Forum & Short Domain - Free! ~Must leave the Definateleet.net link at the bottom of your page or your forum will be suspended) IPB Forum & Short Domain - Free! ~Must leave the DefinateLeet.net link at the bottom of your page or your forum will be suspended) vBulletin & Short Domain - 200k Runescape GP! ~You can remove the definateleet.net link at the bottom of your forums)
Your thinking, how come i need to pay for vBulletin? I have a shared license (Up to 80 domains i can have vBulletin on) this cost me $200 and i hope to make profits from selling mills for the websites.
Is there proof that You own the license? Sure! I'll PM you on vBulletin.com & vbulletin.org ~ Both verified accounts with my name on them.
But.. You can take my website down! I guarentee You that i will not take your website down unless you remove the links.
WHAT YOU GET - FTP account to upload what you want to your website. (WareZ NOT allowed) Allow mods, etc.. To be uploaded to your forum to make it great. (No illegal mods)
Thanks, ~Ghost.
You must PM Me here & i'll give you my MSN.

Have You got Your own private server? Have a massive community and cant get out the rules to every single player on the server?
